participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Sophia enjoys enriching her family life through decorations and festive celebrations.
participant_1.background: I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers. I am not a student, but I am always looking for new ways to challenge myself. I am a stay-at-home mom who loves to make my family proud by decorating for Christmas and other holidays. I enjoy my job, as a teacher. I am Italian American.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and imaginative, Emily finds joy in both her creative business and her outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida. I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination. I am a children's librarian. I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia. But, I feel lost and far away from who I truly am.

content.text: What are some things you like to do for fun?
I love to hike and bike, but my cupcake business also keeps me pretty busy.
That's great! How long have you been making cupcakes?
I started a few years ago as a side hustle, but it's taken off a lot more than I thought it would.
That's wonderful! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I am. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm not much of a baker myself, but I can appreciate the hard work that goes into it.
It definitely takes a lot of time and effort, but it's worth it in the end.
So, what kind of cupcakes do you make?
I make all sorts of cupcakes, but my most popular ones are probably the chocolate chip and vanilla bean.
Those sound delicious! I'm sure they're a big hit.
Yeah, they are. I'm actually going to be doing a cupcake giveaway on my social media pages later this week.
Oh, that's awesome! I'll have to check that out.
Yeah, you should. I'm sure you'll love them.
Thanks for the tip! I'm definitely going to check them out.
